title: So far Peanut has joined teams who knock his team out of the tournament

replies.body:
Well, the rule is if you can't beat them join them...

But seriously, ROX dropped the entire team except Peanut, I doubt he would want to stay there without the teammates he was previously very comfortable with.

SKT is a really good spot for Peanut, his rookie season and his performance at Worlds was immense, he definitely deserves to be there.
